{"blocks":[{"key":"c0ae","text":"Weigh again the glass vials, which now contain the solid residue from the bacterial cultures. The weight of the vials may increase slightly over time from the moment you take them from the oven, as they acquire humidity from the air. To control for this as much as possible, take them out one by one, and wait for a fixed amount of time so that they cool down before weighing (usually 1 minute is enough).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24qs0","text":"Compute density of dry weight at OD=1 as ((wb - wbt) - (wm - wmt))/(OD*V),","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evj95","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egr4l","text":"where","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bs6e1","text":"- wb is the weight of the tube with the dried bacterial residue (measured in step #8)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ancj7","text":"- wbt is the weight of the same tube, but clean (measured in step #3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4g8n","text":"- wm is the weight of the tube with the dried M9 residue (measured in step #8)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h3f4","text":"- wmt is the weight of the same tube, but clean (measured in step #3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h1dn","text":"- OD is the optical density of the bacterial suspension (measured in step #5)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7t87m","text":"- V is the volume that was added to the vials in step #6 (5 mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b95tb","text":"Take clean glass vials, and put them into an oven at 90 C for at least 2 hours, in order to ensure that they are completely dry. Then, weigh each vial separately in a high-accuracy scale (resolution of 0.0001 g or better)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
